QuestData.Title: Darkest Night
QuestData.Description: This keystone will grant its bearer entry into Anguish Fortress.$B$BTake it and meet Prophet Velen outside the Shadowmoon fortress.$B$BHe intends to face Ner'zhul head-on.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prophet Velen at Anguish Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, you've arrived. Rulkan's message said that you would not be long.
